actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to advance to the last Sunday in May the commencement of daylight saving time and to advance to the last Sunday before the first Monday in September the conclusion of daylight saving time period for the year.

summary.text: Advances to the last Sunday in May the commencement of daylight saving time and advances to the last Sunday before the first Monday in September the conclusion of daylight saving time period for the year. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 260a (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to advance to the last Sunday in May the commencement of daylight saving time and to advance to the last Sunday before the first Monday in September the conclusion of daylight saving time period for the year.
